line.text: In faith I do not love thee with mine eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For they in thee a thousand errors note
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But tis my heart that loves what they despise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who in despite of view is pleased to dote
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor are mine cars with thy tongue tune delighted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor tender feeling to base touches prone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor taste nor smell desire to be invited
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To any sensual feast with thee alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But my five wits nor my five senses can
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Dissuade one foolish heart from serving thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who leaves unswayed the likeness of a man
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy proud heart slave and vassal wretch to be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Only my plague thus far I count my gain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That she that makes me sin awards me pain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
